package.description:
This package contains the Stage robot simulator, from the Player Project (http://playerstage.sf.net). This package does not modify Stage in any way, but uses a pre-3.0, unreleased version of Stage. This package will eventually be updated to a newer version of Stage.
This package also provides stageros, a ROS node that uses Stage.
package.author: Richard Vaughan, with contributions from many others. See web page for a full credits list.
